LanguageData.SmokeleafAddiction.label: димолистова залежність
LanguageData.SmokeleafAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to smokeleaf. Long-term use of smokeleaf has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.\n\nWithout regular doses of smokeleaf, withdrawal symptoms will begin. Однак, тривале утримання змушуватиме мозок повернутись назад в нормальний стан, усуваючи залежність.
LanguageData.SmokeleafHigh.label: під кайфом димолиста
LanguageData.SmokeleafHigh.description: Smokeleaf's active chemical in the bloodstream. Generates a soft feeling of fuzzy well-being.
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.label: толерантність до димолисту
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to smokeleaf. The more severe this tolerance is, the more smokeleaf it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.stages.small-0.label: малий
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.stages.small-1.label: малий
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.stages.large.label: великий
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.stages.massive.label: масивний
